text: @IngrahamAngle Don't give up, Laura! Ignore the experts and virologists! Keep promoting hydroxychloroquine! Bring back Dr. Phil! Clinical trials and science are for losers! Swimming pools kill! https://t.co/T08EZZ6raS

entity.name: Dr. Phil
entity.description: Dr. Phillip C. McGraw's show draws on his 25 years of experience in psychology, sociology and observation. Beginning his TV career as the resident expert on human behavior on Oprah Winfrey's daily talk show, Dr. Phil continues to deal with real issues in his blunt style.
